summary: As a lethal virus spreads globally, four friends seek a reputed plague-free haven. But while avoiding the infected, the travelers turn on one another.
cast: Lou Taylor Pucci|Chris Pine|Piper Perabo|Emily VanCamp|Christopher Meloni|Kiernan Shipka|Ron McClary|Mark Moses|Josh Berry|Tim D. Janis|Dale Malley|Dylan Kenin|LeAnne Lynch|Jan Cunningham|Mary Peterson|Sequoyah Adams-Rice|Brighid Fleming
keywords: post apocalypse|closing monologue|covered with cockroaches|blood on face|bra
director: Directors: David Pastor, Àlex Pastor (as Alex Pastor)
title: Infectados (Carriers)
